publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5720.1 Ted Brocklebank: Access to BBC Alba—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5720) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, after "2008" insert "; believes that BBC Alba’s growing viewership, along with the direct employees and the independent broadcasters working for the channel, requires assurances about its long-term economic and cultural future".
